meanings.definition: A representation of a naked child, especially a cherub or a cupid.
meanings.sent1: The artist painted a putti on the ceiling of the church.
meanings.sent2: In the painting, the putti were flying around the garden.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous putti in the artwork seemed to be playing a game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The putti in the mural added a touch of innocence and purity to the scene.
meanings.sent5: The delicate features of the putti made them look like little angels.

meanings.definition: A group of cherubic or angelic figures depicted in art.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a collection of putti sculptures from the Renaissance period.
meanings.sent2: The putti in the fresco were beautifully adorned with flowers and ribbons.
meanings.sent3: The putti in the painting appeared to be having a lively conversation.
meanings.sent4: The artist's use of light and shadow created a sense of depth in the putti group.
meanings.sent5: The putti ensemble in the artwork symbolized innocence and purity.
